inclusion.criterion: Prolongation of prothrombin time > 3 seconds and bilirubin level > 2 mg/dl
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: HAV, HCV, HDV and HIV co-infection
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Drug, metabolic or alcohol as cause of hepatitis
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
